message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid $750000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's unique features and value.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $850000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $775000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value without breaking the bank.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with $775000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for $825000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $825000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $800000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and I'm willing to make a final offer at this price.

Bob, I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $800000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $815000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original price. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $800000. I'm starting to think that the product's value isn't as high as you're making it out to be. I'm willing to make one last offer at $800000, and I expect it to be accepted.

Bob, I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $800000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I'm getting close to walking away from the deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $812500. This is my final and best offer.

Alice, I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go above $800000. I'm not interested in making any further compromises. I'm going to have to walk away from the deal at this point. I'm going to consider buying the product from John for $1000000 instead.
